results.title: Use SQLAlchemy with Azure Databricks - Azure Databricks
results.description: Use SQLAlchemy with Azure Databricks Azure Databricks provides a SQLAlchemy dialect (the system SQLAlchemy uses to communicate with various types of database API implementations and databases) for Azure Databricks. SQLAlchemy is a Python SQL toolkit and Object Relational Mapper (ORM).  ...ing database access, adapted into a simple and PythonicThis.

results.title: Use a notebook to access a database instance - Azure Databricks
results.description: This p... Connect to your database instance from a Azure Databricks notebook using the following Python libraries: psycopg2 psycopg3 SQLAlchemy Prerequisites Before running the following code examples, upgrade the Databricks SDK for Python to version 0.61.0 or above, then restart Python. psycopg2 The code examples demonstrate a single connection.
